#summary outlines pysage API for sending messages

|| *Function* || *Local* || *IPC* || *Network* || *description* ||
||trigger||yes||n/a||n/a||used to immediately process a message synchrounously||
||queue_message||yes||n/a||n/a||puts the message on a queue.  Message will be processed next time "tick" is called||
||queue_message_to_group||n/a||yes||n/a||immediately delivers the message to another pysage group via IPC.  It is up to the called group to process the message||
||send_message||n/a||n/a||yes||immediately delivers the message to another pysage compatible node.  It's up to the called node to process the message||
